original_text: Nevertheless, the high places were not removed. The people still sacrificed and made offerings on the high places. He built the upper gate of the house of the Lord.
korean_text: 오직 산당을 제거하지 아니하였으므로 백성이 여전히 그 산당에서 제사를 드리며 분향하였더라 요담이 여호와의 성전의 윗문을 건축하니라

sentences.original_text: Nevertheless, the high places were not removed.
and made offerings on the high places.
He built the upper gate of the house of the Lord.
